title: Qajar Ab-e Sofla
text: Qajar Ab-e Sofla (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Qajar Āb-e Soflá; also known as Qajarāb and Qajar Āb) is a village in <a href="Kuh%20Sardeh%20Rural%20District">Kuh Sardeh Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Malayer%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Malayer%20County">Malayer County</a>, <a href="Hamadan%20Province">Hamadan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 50, in 13 families.
